The globiomvis package provides functions and examples to support GLOBIOM data visualization,
including the making of maps and creation of plots to compare historical trends with GLOBIOM projections.

To install `globiomvis`, please follow the [installation instructions](installation.html).

The package provides examples for the following tasks:

1. [Generating GLOBIOM scenario plots that compare historical trends with GLOBIOM projections](example1.html).
2. [Generating EU NUTS maps](example2.html).
3. [Generating a global map with the 30 GLOBIOM regions](example3.html).
4. [Generating a global map using LUIDs as the unit of observation](example4.html).
